title: 苦逼新人服主的问题
author: LucienLHF
txt_content: 现在服务器在哪里宣传比较好？

replies.author: 1186629496a
replies.txt_content: 远在天边近在眼前祝你早日6级

replies.author: CloudSpace
replies.txt_content: 贴吧或者发帖

replies.author: mrlll
replies.txt_content: 在这里。。。。

replies.author: wedfwsd
replies.txt_content: 贴吧估计没戏，一群刷贴机

replies.author: __WaackinG__
replies.txt_content: 多水贴，水到六级发服务器贴

replies.author: 智乃offical
replies.txt_content: 6级服务器版

replies.author: pjhxm2019
replies.txt_content: MCBBS上好 其他地方都是搞笑的

replies.author: mcliocc
replies.txt_content: 升到六级在MCBBS宣传

replies.author: 青蛙大大啊
replies.txt_content: 服务器宣传板块，6级可以发帖子

replies.author: Sfeilongzaitian
replies.txt_content: 当然是在神奇的贴吧MCBBS拉(贴吧都是鬼)

replies.author: 无情的枪圣
replies.txt_content: MC百科也行。

replies.author: mingmingnaitang
replies.txt_content: 这里宣传 不过要6级呢

replies.author: xiaoxi喵
replies.txt_content: 这里发服务器帖要6级，短时间内有点难，建议你去mc百科

replies.author: 克鲁鲁殿下
replies.txt_content: 等六级qwqwq

replies.author: Kruls
replies.txt_content: 我建议你在论坛发，贴吧规则很迷

replies.author: 落烬
replies.txt_content: 贴吧还有这里都可以的

replies.author: dreepr322
replies.txt_content: 6级就可以宣传了

replies.author: MC小库
replies.txt_content:
我觉得这里就挺好的（
祝早日6级

replies.author: myslove
replies.txt_content: 越高等级，权限越多，现在你只能在矿工茶馆发帖子，不能发mod，多获得积分升级

replies.author: mcliocc
replies.txt_content: 就这MCBBS，加油升到六级吧！

replies.author: 冰成很帅
replies.txt_content: 当然是伟大的MCbbs

replies.author: 冰成很帅
replies.txt_content: MC贴吧和百科吧

replies.author: TioMor
replies.txt_content: 这里最好,怎么发帖,必须快点升6级,怎么升 就像你现在这样破事氵
